name: Love Note
description: A love note that gets passed around. Lovers must write at least 3 notes in the Love Note to win the game! If a Lover is holding this card, they can treat this card as any number.

name: Tattle
description: Tattle on a lover for passing notes in the classroom. If successful, the lovers are sent to detention and the Tattle Tales win the game! If a Tattle Tale is holding this card, they can treat this card as any number.

name: Pass Direction
description: Every student must pass a card (depending on the current card priority) to the direction displayed.

name: Trade Snacks
description: Pick a student to give you their card. You may give them any card in your hand in exchange.

name: Nosy Glance
description: It's a good day to be nosy! Pick a student to peek at the cards in their hands.

name: Absent
description: You weren't at school! The teacher doesn't believe the tattle tale. This can only be played once by each player

name: Meddle
description: You can tamper with the love note even if you're not holding it!

name: Opposite Day
description: It's opposite day! The direction and priority of the class room has now reversed.

name: Rainy Day
description: It's raining cats and dogs! A note got smeared off from the rain. If this card is drawn, it must be played.
